mil7.8.6:1.1_0: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘bhojanassa tīṇi aṅgāni gahetabbānī’ti yaṁ vadesi, katamāni tāni tīṇi aṅgāni gahetabbānī”ti?
mil7.8.6:1.3_0: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena sabbasattānaṁ maggupatthambhena bhavitabbaṁ.
mil7.8.6:1.4_0: Idaṁ, mahārāja, bhojanassa paṭhamaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
mil7.8.6:2.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, mahārāja, bhojanaṁ sabbasattānaṁ balaṁ vaḍḍheti;
mil7.8.6:2.2_0: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena puññavaḍḍhiyā vaḍḍhitabbaṁ.
mil7.8.6:2.3_0: Idaṁ, mahārāja, bhojanassa dutiyaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
mil7.8.6:3.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, mahārāja, bhojanaṁ sabbasattānaṁ abhipatthitaṁ;
mil7.8.6:3.2_0: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena sabbalokābhipatthitena bhavitabbaṁ.
mil7.8.6:3.3_0: Idaṁ, mahārāja, bhojanassa tatiyaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
